purpose: To build and orchestrate multi-agent AI systems using an event-driven framework.
principle: Leverages event-driven architecture to facilitate agent coordination and interaction with external systems.
reusability: Modular design with APIs for easy integration into existing systems, supports plug-and-play agent components.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack full stability and feature completeness; limited documentation on scaling and performance.
name: solace-agent-mesh
description: An event-driven framework designed to build and orchestrate multi-agent AI systems. It enables seamless integration of AI agents with real-world data sources and systems, facilitating complex, multi-step workflows.
highlight: Seamless integration of AI agents with real-world data sources for orchestrating complex, multi-step workflows.
